title: New Product Technology Project Manager
summary: At Apple, creative ideas have a way of becoming wonderful products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish. As a New Product Technology Project Manager (NPT PM) in the New Technology organization, you will be responsible for on-time delivery of In-coming materials and out-going modules (Display, Touch, Camera, etc).
description:
-  Point-to-Point planning and tracking of Engineering Bill of Materials
- Communicate global logistic status
- Raise or resolve any supply issues (custom delay, logistics constraint, material shortage, etc)
- Handle production Material Clear-to-Build
- Handle day-to-day supply status to meet overall program objectives
key_qualifications:
KEY QUALIFICATIONS
- At least 5 years of industry experiences
- Proficient in English
- Excellent communication and organizational skills
- Strong work ethic with a high degree of flexibility
- Detailed orientated and has can-do attitude
- Proven ability to collaborate with cross-functional team to achieve project goals
[PREFERRED REQUIREMENT]
- Experience in Supply Chain and logistic management (moving things from point A to point B)
- Familiar with Custom Clearance requirements. International Trade Term
- Experience working in a manufacturing environment. Project management
- Fluent in Mandarin or Korean or Japanese are plus
- ~30% Traveling required
